decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Site Location Plan; 32 001 (Existing Plans); 32 002 - 02 (Proposed Plans).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| The detached garden outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwellinghouse on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); and single storey detached garden outbuilding to be used as gym / games room and storage.
